entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain or snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
